snippet: With a deep talent pool and tough selection process, it takes skill, luck and patience to be one of 16 umpires invited to work the event in Williamsport, Pa.
abstract: Sixteen of the world’s best boys’ baseball teams travel to central Pennsylvania to compete in the 2013 Little League World Series, as do 16 of the best umpires Little League Baseball has to offer; with a deep talent pool and tough selection process, it takes skill, luck and patience to be one of 16 umpires invited to work the event in Williamsport, Pa.
lead_paragraph: With a deep talent pool and tough selection process, it takes skill, luck and patience to be one of 16 umpires invited to work the event in Williamsport, Pa.

headline.main: Umpires Relish the Call to Little League’s Series
headline.print_headline: Umpires Relish the Call to Little League’s Series
